sub_tasks.setup_world: Aiden discovers ancient scrolls in the Royal Library revealing his bloodline is tied to the Starforged Blade, a weapon capable of sealing Dragon's Peak. The prophecy warns of a "silver-furred shadow" that will awaken during the Blood Moon, matching the spectral wolf's description.
